channel.title: Compiler error (hope this is right section)
channel.description:
expection in the main java.lang.numberformat exception: for input starting:'''' at java.lang.numberformat exception .forinputstring(Numberformatexception. java:48) at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:468) at java.lang.integer.parseint(integer.java:497) at NPChandler.loadnpcdrops(npchandler.java:2137) at NPChandler.(init)(npchandler.java:551) at server.main(server.java:114)
What does this mean.Plz tell cuz i guess it's about the npchandler file...
